links.title: Problems with my Tesla model S P85 (follow up)
links.description: Hi there all Tesla lovers and electric vehicle fans I am writing this because since I purchased my test in 2013 I've had problem after problem after problem. My car has been in service 20 times in the past three years and I am wondering if there is any one else out there who's had the same experience.

links.title: Stocks And Bond Yields: How High Will You Go?
links.description: The Federal Reserve finally raised interest rates on Wednesday for the first time since last year, and the second time since 2008. The fed-funds rate increased by 25 bps to a range from 0.50% to 0.75%. Financial markets widely expected the Fed's move considering the flow of good economic data in recent weeks.

messages.body: $TSLA Improving Supercharger Availability https://www.tesla.com/blog/improving-supercharger-availability

links.title: Improving Supercharger Availability
links.description: We designed the Supercharger network to enable a seamless, enjoyable road trip experience. Therefore, we understand that it can be frustrating to arrive at a station only to discover fully charged Tesla cars occupying all the spots. To create a better experience for all owners, we're introducing a fleet-wide idle fee that aims to increase Supercharger availability.
